detail_desc: Fully lined swimsuit with a deep, flounce-trimmed, elasticated V-neck front and back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and decorative crossover lacing at the front. High-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Knee-length tunic in a silk and modal weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length tunic in a silk and modal weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in a cotton and silk weave. Fitted at the top with a small, overlocked stand-up collar, smocked bodice and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Maxi dress in soft silk with a V-neck front and back and long, wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Straight style with a low-cut, gathered, voluminous skirt.
Maxi dress in soft silk with a V-neck front and back and long, wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Straight style with a low-cut, gathered, voluminous skirt.

Knee-length dress in softly draping silk. Relaxed fit with spaghetti shoulder straps and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Gathers around the neckline to create a lightly draped effect, and visible seams down the front and back. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in softly draping silk. Relaxed fit with spaghetti shoulder straps and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Gathers around the neckline to create a lightly draped effect, and visible seams down the front and back. Unlined.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a round neck and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked bodice, long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a peplum at the hem. Unlined.
Tunic in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, smocked section around the neckline and buttons down the front. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Tunic in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, smocked section around the neckline and buttons down the front. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
V-neck jumpsuit in soft, gently draping silk with narrow shoulder straps, a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Flared, sleeveless top in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow shoulders straps and a gathered seam at the top. Cotton jersey lining.
Flared, sleeveless top in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow shoulders straps and a gathered seam at the top. Cotton jersey lining.
Long kaftan in a silk and cotton weave with a slight sheen. V-neck with wide, covered elastication around the edges to create a gently draped effect, short sleeves, and slits in the sides.
Long kaftan in a silk and cotton weave with a slight sheen. V-neck with wide, covered elastication around the edges to create a gently draped effect, short sleeves, and slits in the sides.
Cycling shorts in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. High waist with a wide waist panel.
Twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 3 cm.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a softly draping weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High cut at the front, narrow shoulder straps and covered elastication at the back. Cotton jersey lining.

Jacket in stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.

Tunic in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a small V-neck opening and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and gathered seams at the waist and below to create tiers and add width to the hem. Unlined.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Fully lined bikini top with a wrapover front, short cap sleeves and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trainer socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Dress in stretch denim with a V-neck and adjustable straps at the front. Cut-out section at the back with a button and concealed zip, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Quilted waist bag in woven fabric with chain details. Large, zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 8 cm. Height 10 cm. Width 20 cm.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise on the front of the bodice and down the sleeves. Round neckline, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the hems. Seam with a small frill trim at the waist, and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
